item.title: मन्दिर-सेवा
item.description: Source: GA Don’t touch the vRShabha Offer prayers to Vṛṣabha from far & then offer prayers to Bhagavān, followed by a method if circumbulation called somasūtra pradakṣiṇam. No touching of Vṛṣabhadeva or even stepping on his shadow or even allowing one’s shadow to mingle with Vṛṣabhadeva’s. somasūtra circumbulation It should be the default because the Āgama actually advises people against crossing the gomukhī. soma-sUtra-pradaxiNam वृषं चण्डं वृषं चैव सोमसूत्रं पुनर्वृषम्।
